headline: Corteva Separation Talk Raises Valuation Questions After Investor Exit
summary: Hardman Johnston Global Advisors has liquidated its position in Corteva (NYSE:CTVA) after management discussed a possible separation of its Seeds and Crop Protection units. The investor cited concerns about unclear value creation, liability risks within the chemicals-related business, and mixed messages from company leadership. This move has drawn attention to Corteva's future structure and raised questions for shareholders about the direction of the company. Corteva, trading at around...
